detaileddescription.para:
This method initializes the configData for theCSS WLS estimator. It checks to ensure that the inputs are sane and then creates the output message
void
configData
The configuration data associated with the CSS WLS estimator
moduleID
The module identifier

This method resets the sunline attitude filter to an initial state and initializes the internal estimation matrices.
void
configData
The configuration data associated with the CSS estimator
callTime
The clock time at which the function was called (nanoseconds)
moduleID
The module identifier

listitem.para: Zero the local configuration data structures and outputs
Read in mass properties and coarse sun sensor configuration information.
For each coarse sun sensor, convert the configuration data over from structure to body
Save the count of sun sensors for later use
Initialize filter parameters to max values
Ensure that all internal filter matrices are zeroed

detaileddescription.para:
This method takes the parsed CSS sensor data and outputs an estimate of the sun vector in the ADCS body frame
void
configData
The configuration data associated with the CSS estimator
callTime
The clock time at which the function was called (nanoseconds)
moduleID
The module identifier

listitem.para: Read the input parsed CSS sensor data message
If the time tag from the measured data is new compared to previous step, propagate and update the filter
If current clock time is further ahead than the measured time, then propagate to this current time-step
Write the sunline estimate into the copy of the navigation message structure
Populate the filter states output buffer and write the output message

detaileddescription.para:
This method performs the time update for the sunline kalman filter. It calls for the updated Dynamics Matrix, as well as the new states and STM. It then updates the covariance, with process noise.
void
configData
The configuration data associated with the CSS estimator
updateTime
The time that we need to fix the filter to (seconds)

listitem.para: Propagate the previous reference states and STM to the current time
Update the covariance

detaileddescription.para:
This method performs the measurement update for the sunline kalman filter. It applies the observations in the obs vectors to the current state estimate and updates the state/covariance with that information.
void
configData
The configuration data associated with the CSS estimator
updateTime
The time that we need to fix the filter to (seconds)

listitem.para: Compute the valid observations and the measurement model for all observations
Compute the Kalman Gain.
Compute the update with a CKF
Compute the update with a EKF, notice the reference state is added as an argument because it is changed by the filter update

detaileddescription.para:
This method propagates a sunline state vector forward in time. Note that the calling parameter is updated in place to save on data copies. This also updates the STM using the dynamics matrix.
void
dynMat
dt
stateInOut
stateTransition

listitem.para: Unitize the current estimate to find direction to restrict motion
Subtract out rotation in the sunline axis because that is not observable for coarse sun sensors

memberdef.argsstring: (double states[SKF_N_STATES], int numCSS, double cssSensorCos[MAX_N_CSS_MEAS], double sensorUseThresh, double cssNHat_B[MAX_NUM_CSS_SENSORS *3], double CBias[MAX_NUM_CSS_SENSORS], double *obs, double *yMeas, int *numObs, double *measMat)
memberdef.name: sunlineHMatrixYMeas

detaileddescription.para:
This method computes the H matrix, defined by dGdX. As well as computing the innovation, difference between the measurements and the expected measurements. This methods modifies the numObs, measMat, and yMeas.
void
states
numCSS
The total number of CSS
cssSensorCos
The list of the measurements from the CSSs
sensorUseThresh
Thresh The Threshold below which the measuremnts are not read
cssNHat_B
The normals vector for each of the CSSs
CBias
Array of sensor biases
obs
Pointer to the observations
yMeas
Pointer to the innovation
numObs
Pointer to the number of observations
measMat
Point to the H measurement matrix

listitem.para: Loop over all available coarse sun sensors and only use ones that meet validity threshold
For each valid measurement, copy observation value and compute expected obs value and fill out H matrix.

detaileddescription.para:
This method computes the Kalman gain given the measurements.
void
covarBar
The time updated covariance
hObs
The H matrix filled with the observations
qObsVal
The observation noise
numObs
The number of observations
kalmanGain
Pointer to the Kalman Gain

listitem.para: Add measurement noise
Invert the previous matrix
Compute the Kalman Gain

detaileddescription.para:
This method computes the dynamics matrix, which is the derivative of the dynamics F by the state X, evaluated at the reference state. It takes in the configure data and updates this A matrix pointer called dynMat
void
states
Updated states
dt
Time step
dynMat
Pointer to the Dynamic Matrix
